Posts.Content: Hey everyone, I'm 22, and about 3 years ago I noticed a very very tiny amount of white discharge on my nipples, nothing I could really wipe off, it was barely there. Then the tip of my nipples start going inwards, again slightly so... I just realized today that both are signs of cancer. I am so scared and nervous... Any one else had this? Thank you all in advance...
Posts.Title: Inverted nipples ... Maybe cancer ... Scared, worried
